name: Devil's Coin
description:
Resume: After a fight on earth between Angels and Demons who devastated the world, everyone can see when they will die, and because of this, a lot of people lose their hope.

But nothing is losed, if you find an angel, they can take you to heaven.
But, life is made of hard decisions, can you do the right choices?

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Have a good play, i hope you enjoy as much we enjoy to make the game
PS: No sound, we don't know how to make good noises :\.
